transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Ya Tirupati Agro products se baat kar rahe hai Sripat Kadra ji.
Customer: Nahi bataye.
Executive: Ah sir India Mart se baat kar raha hu ye Suchi se baat hua tha sir aapka pichle hafte regarding kis baat regarding ki unhone service service ke regarding call kiya tha aapne call pe feedback diya tha not satisfied ka to uske regarding call kiya tha ki sir kya issue aap face kar rahe ho India Mart se.
Customer: Sir aapko hai na aap mere ko kal ek baar morning call karna tab aapke sir se baat kara denge.
Executive: Acha abhi baat nahi ho payegi sir se.
Customer: Nahi ho payegi.
Executive: Acha acha acha. Thik hai sir. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive called regarding feedback on IndiaMART services.

- Customer wants to speak with the executive's supervisor.



Resolution:

- Executive asked about the issue with IndiaMART.

- Executive agreed to call back the next morning.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back the next morning.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, service, call back
